Articles.Content: The SAS is not working now for any of the rockets i make. I dont know why

Hi Dan, do you have a pilot Kerbal flying the craft? Click the Crew tab in the VAB to change crews, and if you do not have a spare pilot go to the Astronaut Complex and hire another

If it's a probe craft, make sure you use a probe that has SAS.

There's no restrictions in sandbox by the way.

You need a pilot or probe core to use SAS, scientists and engineers cant use SAS. If you killed your Jeb, you will need to hire another pilot.

EDIT: sal_vager is fast
I have the Mk1 module with an SAS module, but because the Kerbal isn't a pilot I can't activate SAS? Is this what's supposed to happen? Because thats really frustrating.
Yes, it's intended behaviour. No way around it - either revert to 0.25 or just be sure to put a Pilot kerbal in your ships. Or use Probes that have SAS functionality.
